title: 科大教職員都同黑警割蓆

replies.msg:
科大校長staff學生都咁高質

[轉發]
[科大教職員協會有關支持香港警察嚴正執法公開聯合聲明之聲明]

[Forwarded]
[HKUST Staff Association's Statement on Joint Declaration of Police Support]

*****

本會特別聲明

科大教職員協會一貫宗旨為服務科大同事, 並不㑹牽涉於任何政治立場或議題。

有鑑最近流傳之一份團體聯署內列有「香港科技大學教職員會」，本會嚴正聲明並無參與任何聯署行動，特此澄清。

SA Special Statement
The objective of HKUSTStaff Association is to serve the colleagues of the University, and the Association will not involve in any political stand or issues.

As “HKUST Staff Association” is included in a widely-circulated joint declaration signed by community groups, this statement serves to clarify seriously that the HKUST Staff Association did not sign any joint declaration.

*****
